      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Ant ant)
        Compare the current ant to another ant, by using it's fitness score This method is used to sort a Collection of ant by their fitness score, order from best to worst
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Ant>
        Parameters:
        ant - the ant to compare to
        Returns:
        1 if the passed ant has a better fitness score than the current ant, 0 if equal, -1 otherwise
